classification.description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as benzodioxoles. These are organic compounds containing a benzene ring fused to either isomers of dioxole. Dioxole is a five-membered unsaturated ring of two oxygen atoms and three carbon atoms.

category.category: Drugs for Peptic Ulcer and Gastro-Oesophageal Reflux Disease (Gord)

atc-code.level: DRUGS FOR PEPTIC ULCER AND GASTRO-OESOPHAGEAL REFLUX DISEASE (GORD)

drug-interaction.name: Cefditoren
drug-interaction.description: The serum concentration of Cefditoren can be decreased when it is combined with Niperotidine.

drug-interaction.name: Dabigatran etexilate
drug-interaction.description: Niperotidine can cause a decrease in the absorption of Dabigatran etexilate resulting in a reduced serum concentration and potentially a decrease in efficacy.
